findings.lung: multiple thin walled cysts; no pleural effusion or pneumothorax; a 1.2 x 1.2 cm pleural based nodular opacity in right lower lung; two sub-4 mm nodules in the left lung base
findings.intra_abdominal_contents: liver, pancreas and adrenal glands are normal; spleen is surgically absent; kidneys are enlarged with numerous cystic and fat-containing lesions; non-obstructing 5.8 mm stone in lower pole of left kidney
findings.bowel: stomach, large and small bowel are normal
findings.appendix: dilated, measuring up to 9.8 mm with surrounding fat inflammation; no evidence of perforation or fluid collection
findings.pelvis: rectum, bladder and sigmoid are normal; uterus is unremarkable; cystic changes in both ovaries; scattered right inguinal lymph nodes do not meet CT size criteria for lymphadenopathy
findings.bones: multiple foci of sclerosis throughout the bones; no fracture

findings.interpretation: normal (reference range 1.6-2.6 mg/dL); no growth noted
